author: cbs8
title: Asia-Pacific Returnable Transport Packaging Market 2015-2019 - Rising Demand for Sustainable Packaging a Key Market Driver
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Sep. 03,
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/mbvs9p/returnable ) has announced the addition of the "Returnable Transport Packaging Market in APAC 2015-2019" report to their offering.
The returnable transport packaging market in APAC to grow at a CAGR of 7.74% over the period 2014-2019.
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the returnable transport packaging market in APAC for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, this report covers revenue generated by returnable transport packaging vendors through the sales and manufacturing of packaging materials.
The report, Returnable Transport Packaging Market in APAC 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
The returnable transport packaging market in APAC shows some growth potential because of the emergence of certain trends. One such trend is the advances in technology, such as GPS-enabled transportation trucks for tracking and RFID for inventory tracking, bar coding, and MIS-related services.
According to the report, one of the main factors that has a positive impact on the market is the financial benefits provided to the end-user. Returnable transport packaging provides end-users with many financial benefits, including revenue enhancement, capital utilization, and reduction in operating costs.
Further, the report states that high initial investment is required in reusable containers, pallets, hand-held containers, barrels, drums, racks, and dunnage, the use of which depends upon many factors, such as the length of the shipping cycle.
The market size is also calculated on the basis of the revenue generated from the following end-users:
F&B industry Manufacturing industry Retail industry Key Vendors
